title: The Getaway (1994) Kim Basinger + Alec Baldwin (opt.SWESUBS)
description:
Optional Swedish subtitles in separate idx/sub files. <a href="
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0109890/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0109890/</a>

With Michael Madsen

I prefer this high-paced action thriller over the original with Steve McQueen from 1972, which I found old-fashioned. In this remake, the sex is better, the explosions bigger, and the stereo sound is great. Only a full DVD seems to remain here at Piratebay, so I made this rip.

DVDrip 2-pass, XviD
Widescreen 272, great stereo sound AC3.
Burn tested, runs well in both my standalone DivX players.
